title: US Soldier Pack: Infantry Assault
description: This Soldier pack includes an Assault Soldier Specialist, the absolute best for leading an assault in any combat situation. Leading an assault can be dangerous and flanking routes are needed. One of the vehicles included in this pack is a mobile spawn vehicle.
longDescription:
This Soldier pack includes an Assault Soldier Specialist, the absolute best for leading an assault in any combat situation. Leading an assault can be dangerous and flanking routes are needed. One of the vehicles included in this pack is a mobile spawn vehicle.

# Contents
- Infantry Soldier
- M1/M2 Carbine
- 1911 Pistol
- Combat Knife 1219C2
- MK II Handgrenade
- CCKW Cargo Truck
- Truck, 1/4 ton, 4x4
- U.S. First Aid Kit
- 30 day Veteran Membership
- 3 x M1/M2 Carbine Specialist Ribbon Booster
- 3 x Chauffeur Ribbon Booster
- 3 x Physical Training Ribbon Booster
- 3 x Medic Ribbon Booster

# M1/M2 Carbine
The M1/M2 carbine is a lightweight, easy-to-use carbine issued to infantry. It has been converted from M1 to M2 with ‘select fire’ enabling both full-automatic as well as semi-automatic firing mode.

# 1911 Pistol
The 1911 Pistol is a well proven, effective and hard hitting handgun. With 8 shots in the magazine, fixed sights and a solid construction, it is just the tool to help you get out of a tricky situation.

# Combat Knife 1219C2
The American Soldier's trusty sidekick. Good for cutting things open and poking holes in enemies. Silent and deadly, but you need to get really close to use it.

# Mk II
The Mk 2 hand grenade (also known as the pineapple grenade) is a fragmentation hand grenade issued to US armed forces. It can be thrown around 30-35 yards by an experienced soldier.

# CCKW Cargo Truck
The ‘Deuce and a Half’ or ‘Jimmy’ as the soldiers call this truck, forms the backbone of the U.S. Army. This vehicle is used to quickly deploy troops anywhere on the battlefield. Because it is unprotected, it should not be taken too close to the enemy.

# Truck, 1/4 ton, 4x4
This small four-wheel drive utility vehicle is used for transportation for all infantry. It is armed with the M1919 light machinegun for defense against infantry. The vehicle is fast and reliable even in rough terrain.

# U.S. First Aid Kit
The first aid kit is a package of bandage carried by the soldier intended for immediate use if he is wounded. The first aid kit can be used to treat the soldiers own wounds as well as his friends.

# Veteran Membership
Progress faster and earn more Credits and Warfunds!

# Ribbon Boosters
Ribbon Boosters will accelerate the progress on all your soldiers during combat. Veteran members will receive the boost on top of the boost from the membership.
